page.title: 06VILLAGE SHOPS
page.content: Just as, 20 years ago, there were two schools in the survey area, so, as recently as l979, there were eight shops. As more people increasingly spent their working days in nearby towns, they shopped at town supermarkets so, one by one,, village shops closed. The last to shut its doors was an electrical contractors' at Hethe (pop. 292) in the summer of l985. Four years earlier, a general stores and Post Office ceased to operate from the village pub at Stoke Lyne and a rural post office now operates froom a nearby detached owner-occupied house.
